title: My life in the war years = My life during the war years
creator_credit: May Donovan and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: May Donovan was a young woman when World War II broke out. She speaks about her life in Melbourne and how she was affected by the war, despite being so far away. She is a member of the Victorian War Widows Guild and created this digital story in memory of Pat Medaris.
title_for_label: My life in the war years = My life during the war years
